Articles.Content:
Hi there! I've been playing KSP for just over a year now and I've finally decided to get off my butt and start taking part in this awesome forum

I'm a bit of a mod junkie, and will probably be hanging around the "awesome pictures" and "what did you do in KSP today?" threads to show off some ship designs. I enjoy writing as well, so maybe I'll start some threads in the Fan Works forum.

Glad to be here
Hello Airlock, welcome to the forum, and thanks for preventing the air from being lost.
